title: Season 3, Episode 39: Special Guest Jamie Golden!

description:
Intro:

1:14 - The Popcast w/ Knox and Jamie

1:19 - Jamie Golden’s Instagram

Bookish Moments:

Current Reads:

8:17 - Faye, Faraway by Helen Fisher (Kaytee)

16:28 - Gone Girl by Gillian Flynn

21:21 - Book of the Month

31:02 - Book Drop Subscription

37:16 - The Odyssey by Homer

38:53 - Invisible Man by Ralph Ellison

39:03 - The Firm by John Grishom

44:07 - The Dearly Beloved by Cara Wall

45:39 - Netgalley

46:09 - Decider.com

48:59 - Persuasion by Jane Austen

Books We Want to Press Into Your Hands:

52:02 - Malibu Rising by Taylor Jenkins Reid (Pre-Order link)

53:12 - Caste by Isabel Wilkerson (Jamie)

53:38 - The Warmth of Other Suns by Isabel Wilkerson

57:49 - Room by Emma Donoghue (Meredith)

1:00:21 - Jamie’s Twitter: @jamiebgolden

1:00:22 - The Popcast on Instagram
